display_long_description:
Brought to you by the executive producers of "All Quiet on the Western Front" and "The Pirate Queen", discover the extraordinary true story of Bertha Benz, a trailblazing pioneer who defied societal norms to embark on the world’s first road trip in 1888.

Starring Daisy Ridley (Star Wars) and directed by Emmy-nominated filmmaker Eloise Singer, Mrs Benz is a 20-minute VR interactive story created by Singer Studios. 

Step into Bertha’s shoes — explore her workshop, assemble the world's first motorcar, and drive through the breathtaking landscape of 1888 Germany.

Celebrated for its cinematic storytelling and meticulously crafted historical settings, this critically acclaimed experience premiered at Cannes Film Festival, Venice and SXSW. 

Perfect for history enthusiasts and story seekers, this story transports you to an extraordinary forgotten moment in history. 

Are you ready to uncover Bertha’s untold story and embark on the journey that changed the world?
